attributes.action: Arrange for Captain Tom Moore to be knighted
attributes.additional_details: Because Captain Tom Moore has raised over £12m for the NHS by walking 100 laps of his garden on the run up to his 100th birthday
attributes.background: Ask the queen to give Captain Tom Moore a knighthood.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
